attributes.additional_details: Instigate an independent audit to ensure UK taxpayers money is not being misappropriated for political reasons
attributes.background: Significant sums of U.K. taxpayers funds have been passed to the Scottish Govt for Covid relief. Companies & individuals are not receiving support whilst failed and or delayed projects are being allocated financial support. Funds may also have been held for future election giveaways.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that is a matter for the Scottish Parliament, which has its own Finance and Constitution Committee, and Audit Scotland.

You can find out more about the Finance and Constitution Committee here: https://www.parliament.scot/parliamentarybusiness/CurrentCommittees/Finance-Constitution-Committee.aspx

You can find out more about Audit Scotland here: https://www.audit-scotland.gov.uk/
